about_the_game:
Survival Horror

You are LunatiiCreeps, a horror-loving streamer known for braving the darkest corners of the gaming world. You get exclusive access to this new strange game and decide to embark on a journey into the shadows of the mind with Lumina Veil.

Classic horror with a modern twist

A captivating horror experience that blurs the line between reality and nightmare. Solve puzzles, survive terrifying monstrosities, and use any tool necessary to fight for your life. Inspired by the horror classics, Lumina Veil offers an old school atmosphere with modern themes.

A double life

While exploring your new game as a streamer, you also live your real life, where the facade of normalcy masks a society grappling with isolation and control.

Completely free solo project

Lumina Veil will be a free game with zero monetization, developed by one person, aiming to give a nod to the classics.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)/Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2070

short_description: Lumina Veil, a horror game with a modern twist! Step into the shoes of a popular streamer on a journey into a strange new game. As you dive deeper, you'll find yourself escaping the isolation of your own world, only to discover that the lines between fantasy and reality are beginning to blur.
